attributes.action: All students given oppurtunity to do November mock exams
attributes.additional_details: Michael Gove decided at the end September 2013 not to allow all students to do Mick exam in November 2013 and that gave rhe descretion of teachers to decide...vote my petition to abolish this. All pupils should be given oppurtunity and not the choice of Teachers or Department of Education. Give you child the chance to take mock exam twice not once.. School performance should bot be monitored by pupils results but behaviour in scools ...!!!
